website_summaries.verdict: Helps relieve tension, and can lessen negative symptoms of osteoporosis and osteopenia with regular use.
pros: This product acts quickly, providing relief from aches and pains
In addition, you may find you sleep more soundly and feel healthier all around
cons: While some feel instant relief, there is little information in terms of long-term benefits

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Oil Extract (250mg)
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I use it while at home. I don’t need any pain relievers at all. When I travel I use another product in a capsule. That works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Gess

customer_reviews.title: I do not remember using this oil at all.
customer_reviews.text: The only oil drops I have ever used are for my earache. This is not it though.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Help
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this, I fall asleep more easily and sleep better, without waking up numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Lessen knee discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I used it a lot specially for my arthritis knees
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A Gantan

customer_reviews.title: It also worked
customer_reviews.text: This was my first try wit hemp oil. I got good results from the250mg now Im doing 500 only becase the original was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest buying local with CBDs. I couldn't tell that this worked very well at all. But I thought I would give it a shot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold issue
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to have grown mold in the bottle after a couple months of not being used?

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: did not help at all. didnt taste good as well. do not recommend

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: I could not tell that this product helped with my pain at all.
customer_reviews.author: LindaRosie

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would help
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would help with aches and pains but the taste was so horrible that I had to hold my nose to take it. It might have worked if I had given it more time but the taste was so hard to get past. I feel it did work but I did not give it enough of a chance. Could not get past the taste. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: S.b.J.

customer_reviews.title: Did not help me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this hemp oil with the intent of it helping with pain relief and soreness. I didn’t really feel like it helped at all though. The taste was fine but I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders for pain relief. I have pain from inflammation and have tried all kinds of things. This is the answer. I just have to remember to take it! Once the pain is not there I forget.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did nothing for me. I should have educated myself before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint Flavor
customer_reviews.text: 250mg of hemp oil just takes the edge off. It also has a peppermint taste so it’s much better tasting than others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Langlitz

customer_reviews.title: Works on my anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from pretty bad anxiety that affects all aspects of my life and also depression. I do medicate for depression, but anxiety meds they wanted to put me on kind of turned me into a zombie. So I don't take them. Someone recommended CBD oil. I've been taking it for a couple days, very skeptically because how could it be so simple? It is that simple though. It really works on my anxiety. It gives that calm, easy-going feeling without the high you get from marijuana. I'm more relaxed than I've been in years. I hope this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey E. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not a placebo effect--it provided real relief
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried it for only two days and we both had significant relief from our arthritic back, hips, leg, and shoulder pains. And neither of us have ever been accused of experiencing a "placebo" effect in our 80 years--so it must be real. My wife mixes it with a EMU Lidocaine cream and has it massaged on the painful areas; I used it orally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Since starting I have noticed less pain than in my knees! Hoping for more relief as time goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gascho

customer_reviews.title: Helps hips and knees!
customer_reviews.text: Helps hips and knees. This product really relieves the pain in my knees and hips.Recommended if you overdid life, like too much skiing, tennis, hiking, surfing, and your body is letting you know that you not thirty anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Banfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Full of omegas. Makes me sharp in the brain!
customer_reviews.author: platy

customer_reviews.title: Helps with inflammation
customer_reviews.text: The hemp oil really makes a difference in pain and inflammation from the herniated disc in my back. If I happen to miss a day, I notice the difference. Will certainly keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: christine ahearn

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for a week.
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with anxiety and neck + knee pain. I also changed my diet when I started this oil a week ago. The most significant difference I’ve noticed so far is increased relaxation. No change in arthritis pain yet. I take 2/3 dropper 2x/day. Will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: OtherWynnGirl

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the results she has had
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my Daughter that was stricken with Bell's Palsy , having anxiety attacks and very high blood pressure problems , I am very pleased with the results she has had, will continue to re order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Relieved pain
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my scoliosis and my slipped ankle. I've put it on my grandmothers hip and my dads broken knee. The family thanks Nature Driven.

customer_reviews.title: Natural anxiety relief
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with this product! I recommend giving it a try.

customer_reviews.text: This product really works for my anxiety and sleep issues. I would recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Help for my wife's back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and I got it to help my wife with all of her pain issues but mainly for her back pain. She is getting more relive from this than the pain drugs that the doctor gives her.

product_meta.title: Hemp Oil Extract (250mg) - for Pain Relief and Anti-Anxiety Support - All-Natural Ingredients - Promotes Relaxation & General Good Health - 1 FL OZ per Bottle
product_meta.description:
You can now get high-quality hemp oil without leaving the house. Here at Nature Driven, we wanted to put out a supplement that doesn’t just work but works WELL.

Every bottle of our hemp oil contains all-natural ingredients including natural hemp extract, but also great natural peppermint flavor. You can enjoy this supplement without the off-putting plant taste linked to most other products on the market.

Experience all of the great benefits for yourself. Hemp oil is known to help you relax after a long day, and drift off to sleep at night. This is great for people who work intense, high-demand jobs. You need your rest -- and we want to help.

You’ll get at least a month’s supply out of every 1 FL OZ bottle. You can take between 1-2 servings a day, or as needed. Stock up today! Perhaps one of the best things about our supplements, is that they are all made in FDA registered plants right here in the USA. Now we can bring our quality products right to your front door.
feature_bullets: GREAT TASTE. Enjoy the luxury of an age-old folk medicine without all the fuss. Natural, delicious, peppermint flavor.
PREMIUM EXTRACT. Made with the finest ingredients, all naturally sourced. Designed to work with your body, not against it.
PROMOTES QUALITY REST. Tired of tossing and turning? Many swear by the benefits of hemp oil. Can help you fall asleep faster, and enjoy quality sleep.
ONE MONTH SUPPLY. Every 1FL OZ bottle comes with 30 servings. You can take up to two servings a day for best results.
MADE IN THE U.S. We bottle and distribute all of our supplements right here in the USA in FDA registered facilities for quality and consistency.
